      • duplicateMode

        public void duplicateMode​(byte[] data,
                          int len,
                          java.net.InetAddress address,
                          int port,
                          java.lang.String src,
                          java.lang.String dest,
                          int packetCount,
                          TFTPSim.Type receivedType)
        Creates a duplicate packet
        Parameters:
        data - the data in the packet
        len - the length of the data
        address - the address of the destination
        port - the port number of the destination
        src - the sender of the packet
        dest - the destination of the packet
        packetCount - the block number
        receivedType - the type (DATA, ACK, etc...) of packet that's received

      • lossMode

                     TFTPSim.Type receivedType,
                     boolean isClient)
        Loses a packet
        Parameters:
        socket - the receive socket
        receivedType - the type (DATA, ACK, etc...) of packet that's received
        isClient - true if packet was from client
